HelloFresh | Frontend (Full Stack), Backend, iOS, Android | Berlin | Onsite | Visa

We are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. This is a unique opportunity to gain valuable and challenging experience at a rapidly growing startup. Responsibility is given from day one to use your initiative and creativity to help us grow our business. We are fast-paced and love the food world.

We're looking for Full stack, Frontend, Backend, iOS and Android Developers who are keen to gain exposure to a modern stack and work as part of a team of exceptional engineers.

For more info about our culture and projects check out our Engineering blog at: https://engineering.hellofresh.com For our stack check out our Stackshare at: https://stackshare.io/hellofresh/hellofresh-com

We work with PHP, Go, Docker, React.JS/Redux, Angular.JS, and are currently transitioning towards a microservice focused approach.

If you're keen to join our team, please apply using the appropriate link (so we know you came from HackerNews!): Full Stack: http://grnh.se/e3m2ki1 Frontend: http://grnh.se/5yd3vc1 Backend: http://grnh.se/p4s6yu1 iOS: http://grnh.se/ocy2f81 Android: http://grnh.se/kwlf6j1
